recommendations: Maintain a balanced diet with a mix of macronutrients.
Focus on whole, unprocessed foods for optimal nutrition.
Include a variety of fruits and vegetables in different colors.
Incorporate lean protein sources like poultry, fish, beans, and tofu.
Choose whole grains such as brown rice, quinoa, and whole wheat bread.
Include healthy fats from sources like avocados, nuts, and olive oil.
Stay hydrated with water and limit sugary beverages.
Practice portion control and mindful eating.
Engage in regular physical activity for overall health.

foods: Whole grain cereal with low-fat milk and sliced strawberries
Grilled chicken or tofu salad with mixed greens and a variety of veggies
Baked fish with roasted sweet potatoes and steamed broccoli
Whole grain pasta with tomato sauce
Greek yogurt with a handful of almonds
